subject: Re: Re:  Hello,
body:
Hello Isabel,

There is a process to get this done. If you can follow the process diligently as I will direct you,you will have this money within the next few days.
Whatever I am doing for you concerning this, is because I hate injustice. I do not like the idea of these big bosses capitalising on the ignorance of some beneficiaries to feed their greedy appetite.

Here is the process.
A sworn affidavit from a county court stating that;
(1). You have no idea of any person in the name of Mr. Smith Hsu who claims to be your representative.
(2). You did not give any power of attorney to anybody or group of persons to act on your behalf and have not changed your account number.

After this, I will send you form and link to open an online bank account on our bank where the money will be transferred to.
Thereafter, the current Director of international remittance/foreign operations department of our bank,will acknowledge the affidavit. You will open an online bank account on our bank.I will immediately send the money to your online bank account from where you will be transferred to your designated bank account with your login details and subsequently transfer to your local bank account of your choice.


Rohana Arafath
